import React, { Component } from "react"; import GamePage from "./GamePage.jsx"; class Game extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { details: this.props.game, }; } render() { return (

{this.state.details.name} 1st Edition

{"Developed by " + this.state.details.developer}

Developer {this.state.details.developer}
Rating {this.state.details.rating}
Platform(s) {this.state.details.platform}
Release {this.state.details.release}
Price {this.state.details.price}

Game Description

{this.state.details.description}

); } } export default Game;
